resources.string:
Tic Tac Woah is a complex and advanced game based on the famous Tic Tac Toe game. This game can be played by 2-4 players. Each player gets different sized pieces like circles or triangles. The sizes are small, medium and large. 

 	 There are three ways to win, scroll left to view more info on this.
\t One way to win is to have 3 concentric circles in the same spot. \n\n
\t Another way to win is to have 3 same sized pieces in a row or column or diagonal. \n\n
\t The final way to win is to have 3 different sized pieces in ascending or descending order either horizontally, vertically or diagonally. \n\n
